name: The iron bands of Bilarro
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence adequately.
It has awesome armour class for its type (little in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
